title: Strengthening Pedagogical Competencies in Practice: Advanced Language Learning Strategies Using Online Discussion Boards

context.prior_knowledge: Basic online learning tool proficiency and intermediate or higher language skills
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners engage in structured language discussion activities with peer learners via discussion boards at least twice weekly.
Learners generate language expressions reflecting cultural context with 80% or higher accuracy in discussion boards.
Learners revise and improve discussion posts at least three times based on peer review and instructor feedback.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
